<a id="class_Curve"></a>

# Curve

**Inherits:** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A mathematical curve.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This resource describes a mathematical curve by defining a set of points and tangents at each point. By default, it ranges between ``0`` and ``1`` on the X and Y axes, but these ranges can be changed.

Please note that many resources and nodes assume they are given *unit curves*. A unit curve is a curve whose domain (the X axis) is between ``0`` and ``1``. Some examples of unit curve usage are [CPUParticles2D.angle_curve](class_cpuparticles2d.md#class_CPUParticles2D_property_angle_curve) and [Line2D.width_curve](class_line2d.md#class_Line2D_property_width_curve).

## Signals

<a id="class_Curve_signal_domain_changed"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**domain_changed**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_signal_domain_changed)

Emitted when [max_domain](class_curve.md#class_Curve_property_max_domain) or [min_domain](class_curve.md#class_Curve_property_min_domain) is changed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<!-- classref-signal -->

**range_changed**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_signal_range_changed)

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_Curve_TangentMode"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **TangentMode**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_Curve_TangentMode)

<a id="class_Curve_constant_TANGENT_FREE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[TangentMode](class_curve.md#enum_Curve_TangentMode) **TANGENT_FREE** = `0`

The tangent on this side of the point is user-defined.<a id="class_Curve_constant_TANGENT_LINEAR"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[TangentMode](class_curve.md#enum_Curve_TangentMode) **TANGENT_LINEAR** = `1`

The curve calculates the tangent on this side of the point as the slope halfway towards the adjacent point.<a id="class_Curve_constant_TANGENT_MODE_COUNT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[TangentMode](class_curve.md#enum_Curve_TangentMode) **TANGENT_MODE_COUNT** = `2`

The total number of available tangent modes.<hr class="classref-section-separator">

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_Curve_property_bake_resolution"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **bake_resolution** = `100` [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_property_bake_resolution)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_bake_resolution**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_bake_resolution**\ (\ )

The number of points to include in the baked (i.e. cached) curve data.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Curve_property_max_domain"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **max_domain** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_property_max_domain)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_max_domain**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_max_domain**\ (\ )

The maximum domain (x-coordinate) that points can have.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Curve_property_max_value"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **max_value** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_property_max_value)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_max_value**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_max_value**\ (\ )

The maximum value (y-coordinate) that points can have. Tangents can cause higher values between points.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Curve_property_min_domain"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **min_domain** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_property_min_domain)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_min_domain**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_min_domain**\ (\ )

The minimum domain (x-coordinate) that points can have.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Curve_property_min_value"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **min_value** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_property_min_value)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_min_value**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_min_value**\ (\ )

The minimum value (y-coordinate) that points can have. Tangents can cause lower values between points.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Curve_property_point_count"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **point_count** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_property_point_count)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_point_count**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_point_count**\ (\ )

The number of points describing the curve.

<hr class="classref-section-separator">

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_Curve_method_add_point"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **add_point**\ (\ position\: [Vector2](class_vector2.md), left_tangent\: [float](class_float.md) = 0, right_tangent\: [float](class_float.md) = 0, left_mode\: [TangentMode](class_curve.md#enum_Curve_TangentMode) = 0, right_mode\: [TangentMode](class_curve.md#enum_Curve_TangentMode) = 0\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_method_add_point)

Adds a point to the curve. For each side, if the ``*_mode`` is [TANGENT_LINEAR](class_curve.md#class_Curve_constant_TANGENT_LINEAR), the ``*_tangent`` angle (in degrees) uses the slope of the curve halfway to the adjacent point. Allows custom assignments to the ``*_tangent`` angle if ``*_mode`` is set to [TANGENT_FREE](class_curve.md#class_Curve_constant_TANGENT_FREE).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Curve_method_bake"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **bake**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_method_bake)

Recomputes the baked cache of points for the curve.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Curve_method_clean_dupes"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **clean_dupes**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_method_clean_dupes)

Removes duplicate points, i.e. points that are less than 0.00001 units (engine epsilon value) away from their neighbor on the curve.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Curve_method_clear_points"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **clear_points**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_method_clear_points)

Removes all points from the curve.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Curve_method_get_domain_range"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](class_float.md) **get_domain_range**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_method_get_domain_range)

Returns the difference between [min_domain](class_curve.md#class_Curve_property_min_domain) and [max_domain](class_curve.md#class_Curve_property_max_domain).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Curve_method_get_point_left_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[TangentMode](class_curve.md#enum_Curve_TangentMode) **get_point_left_mode**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_method_get_point_left_mode)

Returns the left [TangentMode](class_curve.md#enum_Curve_TangentMode) for the point at `index`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Curve_method_get_point_left_tangent"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](class_float.md) **get_point_left_tangent**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_method_get_point_left_tangent)

Returns the left tangent angle (in degrees) for the point at `index`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Curve_method_get_point_position"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Vector2](class_vector2.md) **get_point_position**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_method_get_point_position)

Returns the curve coordinates for the point at `index`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Curve_method_get_point_right_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[TangentMode](class_curve.md#enum_Curve_TangentMode) **get_point_right_mode**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_method_get_point_right_mode)

Returns the right [TangentMode](class_curve.md#enum_Curve_TangentMode) for the point at `index`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Curve_method_get_point_right_tangent"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](class_float.md) **get_point_right_tangent**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_method_get_point_right_tangent)

Returns the right tangent angle (in degrees) for the point at `index`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Curve_method_get_value_range"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](class_float.md) **get_value_range**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_method_get_value_range)

Returns the difference between [min_value](class_curve.md#class_Curve_property_min_value) and [max_value](class_curve.md#class_Curve_property_max_value).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Curve_method_remove_point"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **remove_point**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_method_remove_point)

Removes the point at `index` from the curve.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Curve_method_sample"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](class_float.md) **sample**\ (\ offset\: [float](class_float.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_method_sample)

Returns the Y value for the point that would exist at the X position `offset` along the curve.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Curve_method_sample_baked"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](class_float.md) **sample_baked**\ (\ offset\: [float](class_float.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_method_sample_baked)

Returns the Y value for the point that would exist at the X position `offset` along the curve using the baked cache. Bakes the curve's points if not already baked.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Curve_method_set_point_left_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_point_left_mode**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md), mode\: [TangentMode](class_curve.md#enum_Curve_TangentMode)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_method_set_point_left_mode)

Sets the left [TangentMode](class_curve.md#enum_Curve_TangentMode) for the point at `index` to `mode`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Curve_method_set_point_left_tangent"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_point_left_tangent**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md), tangent\: [float](class_float.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_method_set_point_left_tangent)

Sets the left tangent angle for the point at `index` to `tangent`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Curve_method_set_point_offset"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **set_point_offset**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md), offset\: [float](class_float.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_method_set_point_offset)

Sets the offset from ``0.5``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Curve_method_set_point_right_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_point_right_mode**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md), mode\: [TangentMode](class_curve.md#enum_Curve_TangentMode)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_method_set_point_right_mode)

Sets the right [TangentMode](class_curve.md#enum_Curve_TangentMode) for the point at `index` to `mode`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Curve_method_set_point_right_tangent"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_point_right_tangent**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md), tangent\: [float](class_float.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_method_set_point_right_tangent)

Sets the right tangent angle for the point at `index` to `tangent`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Curve_method_set_point_value"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_point_value**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md), y\: [float](class_float.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_Curve_method_set_point_value)

Assigns the vertical position `y` to the point at `index`.
